title: How do I shut off the clock displayed when my phone is locked?
content: I have a Pixel 2 XL that recently updated to Android 11.  Before the update, the clock would display on my lock screen, but not display once the screen timed out & went black.  After the update, the clock started displaying even when the lock screen times out & turns black & I want to shut that off, but can't seem to find a setting to do so.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
